channel.title: Changing a weapons attack emote? (317) (czar)
channel.description: i wanna change/ add my d claws attack emote cos i just added them and wanna change the emote. it would also be nice if someone could help me add d claws spec that hits 4 times and hits hard (note: i dont already have it) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 09:41:29 am[/size][hr]anyone replying??

item.title: Changing a weapons attack emote? (317) (czar)
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

There’s a shitload of emotes for weapons. Such search a weapon’s ID, like 4151, and everytime you see if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { return something; } it’s one its emotes, such as running, walking, standing, and attacking. You just have to find out what’s what.

Read full topic
